Indian students often ask me, how to get a job in tech after your degree, B-tech vs BCA, & more. In this thread I have categorised opportunities after college in India into levels. Taking into consideration the prerequisites, perks, pros & cons for each.

RT for reach üòÑ
Don‚Äôt know why but 2012-2017 seemed a lot longer than 2017-2022.

College hiring is terrible in India. 
You can't negotiate, you can't interview further with other firms once you get placed.

The moment you exit college, none of such rules apply anymore.
Skills do decide your payscale, but only after you graduate from your university in India.
Societies that don‚Äôt understand value of time will never desire productivity in all things and will keep losing money on products that sell hope.
